com.smartsockets
Class TipcProperties

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary
      java.util.Hashtable
          com.smartsockets.TipcProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map, java.io.Serializable
public class TipcProperties
extends java.util.Hashtable

Table of TipcOption objects, which can contain another table as its defaults; this second collection is searched if the TipcOption is not found in the original table.

Since:
SmartSockets 6.0
See Also:
Serialized Form

createOption

public TipcOption createOption(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String value)
                        throws TipcException
Create a new option.

Parameters:
name - the option to create.
value - the initial value of the option.
Returns:
the newly created option.
Throws:
TipcAlreadyExistsException - if the option already exists.
TipcException

createOption

public TipcOption createOption(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String value,
                               boolean require,
                               boolean readOnly,
                               boolean protect)
                        throws TipcException
Create a new option.

Parameters:
name - the option to create.
value - the initial value of the option.
require - if the option is required to have a value.
readOnly - if the option is read only.
protect - if the option is to be protected (non-monitorable).
Returns:
the newly created option.
Throws:
TipcAlreadyExistsException - if the option already exists.
TipcException

                         java.lang.String header)
                  throws TipcException
Writes this collection to the specified output stream suitable for loading using the loadOptions

Parameters:
out - an output stream.
Throws:
throws - TipcIOException when errors occur writing to the file
throws - TipcException for all other errors
TipcException

loadOptionsFile

public void loadOptionsFile(java.lang.String filename)
                     throws TipcException
Reads options from a file.

Parameters:
filename - the file from which to read the options.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist.
TipcFileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
TipcIOException - if an error occurs when reading.
TipcException - for all other errors

loadOptionsURL

public void loadOptionsURL(java.lang.String spec)
                    throws TipcException
Reads options from an URL.

Parameters:
spec - the url from which to read the options.
Throws:
TipcMalformedURLException - if the string specifies an invalid url
TipcIOException - if an error occurs when reading.
TipcException - for all other errors
